To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AdvanceDeclineRatio _adr;

// In Initialize()
var symbols = new[] {AddEquity("SPY").Symbol, AddEquity("QQQ").Symbol};
_adr = ADR(symbols);

// In OnData()
if (_adr.IsReady)
{
    var current = _adr.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbols = [self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol, self.AddEquity("QQQ").Symbol]
self.adr = self.ADR(symbols)

# In OnData()
if self.adr.IsReady:
    current = self.adr.Current.Value
